quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
I came out of the womb born to sing and dance. I have to follow my heart.
Follow your heart, but be quiet for a while first. Ask questions, then feel the answer. Learn to trust your heart.
Go ahead and stand up for what you believe in. As I've learned, that's the path to happiness.
You do have to follow your heart, otherwise you're living a false life.
You can't do passion halfway. Living your passion means you're all in. You trust your heart and trust your gut wherever that takes you.
How wrong we are to ignore our hearts to follow the familiar path.
Born free to follow your heart.
Follow your heart. Then root its longing with the facts.
You can choose to follow your heart always.
Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
You will never follow your own inner voice until you clear up the doubts in your mind.
Follow your heart but take your brain with you.
Follow your heart. Even though it's on your left, it's always right.
Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.
To know how to choose a path with heart is to learn how to follow intuitive feeling. Logic can tell you superficially where a path might lead to, but it cannot judge whether your heart will be in it.
If you ever find yourself in doubt follow your heart as it will guide you to the right course.
If you follow your heart and end with a song.
Heart-flow means listening to your intuition and hunches and following your heart. How can you let your heart lead today?
Just follow your heart's voice.
Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens.
Always follow your heart ! When your heart feels at peace, rest assured, you are on the right track.
You must never doubt your ability to achieve anything, become anything, overcome anything and inspire everything.
It's been very important for me to follow my gut or my heart, or whichever organ you want to go by.
I think it's important to have a dream and to follow your heart.
Follow your heart and make it your decision.

What I have to do now is figure where my passion is, and follow my heart; I've proven that if I have the passion for something then I can succeed. I haven't been listening to my heart in the last little while.
Your heart is free, have the courage to follow it.
If you follow your dreams, it means you follow your heart. If you do follow your heart, I don't think you can go wrong.
You can do anything as long as you don't stop believing. When it is meant to be, it will be. You just have to follow your heart.

If you listen to everybody's opinions, I mean, I always say I'd be digging a ditch on the side of the road now if I had listened to what everybody told me what to do. You know, you have to follow your heart, you have to.
I'm reading your heart. I'm asking you to follow it. Begging you.
Break the rules, stand apart, ignore your head, and follow your heart.
Everyone wants to belong, or be a part of something bigger than themselves, but it's important to follow your heart and be true to yourself in the process.

I think it's imperative to follow your heart and choose a profession you're passionate about, and if you haven't found that 'spark' yet, if you're not sure what you want to do with your lives - be persistent until you do.
Everyone has that inner voice, the one that's a Negative Nancy. I'd say to ignore that voice and to be confident and follow your heart.
They say you must follow your heart in order to love, because heart know every feeling you are ready to convey.
Stay away from people who try to belittle your faith, goals and ambitions. follow your heart and keep pushing forward.
Imagine for yourself a character, a model personality whose example you determine to follow, in private as well as in public.
The decision I've made has come from my heart. That's me, to follow my heart.
Don't worry about things that you simply cannot know. Let them fall back and recede like the foam pushed aside by the flanks of a ship. Leave them behind and let your heart power on.
Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.
Follow that will and that way which experience confirms to be your own.
Initiative is doing the right thing without being told.
If you follow your heart, if you listen to your gut, and if you extend your hand to help another, not for any agenda, but for the sake of humanity, you are going to find the truth.
Follow what you are genuinely passionate about and let that guide you to your destination.
Follow your heart, go wherever it may lead. Follow your heart and you're sure to succeed!
To reach your destination, follow the directions of your heart. It knows the way.
Do what you feel in your heart to be right - for you'll be criticized anyway.
Listen to advice, but follow your heart.
